Detailed Description

mgTLTriangle holds (multiple) triangles data, which are indices of mgTLPoints.

mgTLTriangle is generated from trimmed mgTLRect's using utility class mgTLFan, or mgTLFans. ３角形ポリゴンのタイプ(triFan,triStrip)と頂点インデックスベクトル保持クラス.

Member Function Documentation

bool mgTLTriangle::texture_triangle ( mgTLData &  tldata  ) 

Assumed this type is mgTESTRIANG_FAN and at least one of the perimeter is textued, compute all the other perimeter's texture.

MGPosition mgTLTriangle::world ( size_t  id,
const mgTLPoints &  tlpoints,
const MGFace &  f 
) const

Get world coordinates of the surface from the id of this triangl.

The output is surf.eval(uv(id,tlpoints));

Parameters:
id id of this triangle. 0<= id <= size().
tlpoints tlpoints[(*this)[id]] is (u,v), or uv(id, tlpoints) is (u,v).
f Tessellated face.
MGPosition mgTLTriangle::world ( size_t  id,
const mgTLPoints &  tlpoints,
const MGSurface &  surf 
) const
Parameters:
id id of this triangle. 0<= id <= size().
tlpoints tlpoints[(*this)[id]] is (u,v), or uv(id, tlpoints) is (u,v).
surf Tessellated surface. When the object was a face f, surf=*(f.surface());

Member Data Documentation

std::vector<size_t> mgTLTriangle::m_indices

三角形頂点情報インデックスのベクトル

Let id=m_indices[i], then mgTLPoints[id]=MGPosition& uv=(u,v) parameter value of the surface.
